about_the_game: This bundle contains the M-95 Degman Premium MBT, 1.000 Gold and 7 days of Premium Time. In Armored Warfare, the M-95 Degman Tier 8 MBT is relatively fast and fairly agile while carrying some potent firepower for its Tier. In fact, its owners can choose from two powerful guns – the 125mm 2A46 Russian-style smoothbore gun known from many Russian MBTs, and the 120mm CTG NATO-style smoothbore gun that you know from the Challenger 1 Falcon MBT. It’s worth noting that the 120mm shells have higher penetration values and the gun can also fire Falarick ATGMs while the 125mm gun has higher damage per shot. Both guns will feature good handling as well as overall performance to offset the vehicle’s weakness, which is its mediocre armor. The Degman must rely on its mobility and firepower to survive, making it an ideal vehicle for aggressive, daring players.

In Armored Warfare, the M-95 Degman Tier 8 MBT is relatively fast and fairly agile while carrying some potent firepower for its Tier. In fact, its owners can choose from two powerful guns – the 125mm 2A46 Russian-style smoothbore gun known from many Russian MBTs, and the 120mm CTG NATO-style smoothbore gun that you know from the Challenger 1 Falcon MBT. It’s worth noting that the 120mm shells have higher penetration values and the gun can also fire Falarick ATGMs while the 125mm gun has higher damage per shot. Both guns will feature good handling as well as overall performance to offset the vehicle’s weakness, which is its mediocre armor. The Degman must rely on its mobility and firepower to survive, making it an ideal vehicle for aggressive, daring players.
name: Armored Warfare - M-95 Degman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core2Duo CPU 6700 @ 2.66GHz (2 CPUs), ~2.7GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9500 GT 512 MB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 34 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.1GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 275 896 MB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

pegi.descriptors:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 7 years and over only.
It contains: Violence that is not shown but is implied
